experience.title: Trainee Technician
experience.description: Led as Trainee Technician in Base Maintenance Department, Bengaluru. Work Profile:•	C5 and C6 checks on new generation Boeing 737-700/800 fitted with CFM 56-7B engines.•	C1, C6, 24 Monthly checks of ATR 72-212A aircraft fitted with P&W 127F engines.
experience.description_html: Led as Trainee Technician in Base Maintenance Department, Bengaluru. Work Profile:• C5 and C6 checks on new generation Boeing 737-700/800 fitted with CFM 56-7B engines.• C1, C6, 24 Monthly checks of ATR 72-212A aircraft fitted with P&W 127F engines. <!---->

education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
education.description: Completed Masters in Aerospace Engineering where the main project is to carry out static and dynamic analysis of laminated composite plates equipped with piezoelectric patches thereby analyzing the variation in its natural frequency for varying fibre orientation and stacking sequence.
education.description_html: Completed Masters in Aerospace Engineering where the main project is to carry out static and dynamic analysis of laminated composite plates equipped with piezoelectric patches thereby analyzing the variation in its natural frequency for varying fibre orientation and stacking sequence. <!---->

education.title: Aeronautical Society of India
education.description: I have completed Section A and Section B of Associate Membership examination conducted by AeSI on June 2013 which covered the basic subjects of aeronautical engineering like structures, stability and performance, control engineering, avionics systems etc.
education.description_html: I have completed Section A and Section B of Associate Membership examination conducted by AeSI on June 2013 which covered the basic subjects of aeronautical engineering like structures, stability and performance, control engineering, avionics systems etc. <!---->

education.title: Agragami VSM AME Training Institute,Bengaluru
education.field: Avionics Systems equipped in heavy and light aircrafts
education.description: Carried out 5 semesters learning of Civil Aircraft Rules and Regulation (CAR), Principles of Flight, General Aircraft Maintenance Practices and exposure to Avionics Systems on light and heavy aircrafts and cleared DGCA PAPERS (Govt. of India-Ministry of Civil Aviation ) Paper 1: CAR-Rules and Regulations (Oct-2007) - 73% Paper 2: General Engineering (Oct 2008) - 77%
education.description_html: Carried out 5 semesters learning of Civil Aircraft Rules and Regulation (CAR), Principles of Flight, General Aircraft Maintenance Practices and exposure to Avionics Systems on light and heavy aircrafts and cleared DGCA PAPERS (Govt. of India-Ministry of Civil Aviation )  Paper 1: CAR-Rules and Regulations (Oct-2007) - 73% Paper 2: General Engineering (Oct 2008) - 77% <!---->

projects: [{"title":"Static and Buckling analysis of smart laminated composite plates","start_date":"Jun 2013","end_date":"May 2015","description":"Detailed study on static and dynamic analysis of laminated composite plate equipped with piezoelectric patches and response of its natural frequency for varying fibre orientation and stacking sequence using MATLAB coding language"},{"title":"Instrument Landing System","start_date":"Feb 2013","end_date":"Mar 2013","description":"Produced a study report on Instrument Landing Systems (ILS) equipped on Boeing 737-700/800 aircraft and has undergone basic training and introduction to Avionics Systems for a period of two weeks from Tagore Engineering College, Chennai"}]
